title: I Don't Want to Talk about Cheating
itunes:title: I Don't Want to Talk about Cheating
description:
Wednesday 6/11- Today on the show we had Charmaine from "Black Ink Crew Chicago" stop by, where she discussed how she got into her career, the fights on the show, and even how she proposed and got denied by her boo. Speaking of denial, we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners reasoning of why men deny the conversation about cheating. Moreover, Charlamagne gave the hee haw to yet another Florida man, for shooting at his mother because she asked for money to cover gas and rent. And Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Wednesday 6/11- Today on the show we had Charmaine from "Black Ink Crew Chicago" stop by, where she discussed how she got into her career, the fights on the show, and even how she proposed and got denied by her boo. Speaking of denial, we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners reasoning of why men deny the conversation about cheating. Moreover, Charlamagne gave the hee haw to yet another Florida man, for shooting at his mother because she asked for money to cover gas and rent. And Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".
